welcome_message_body: "Welcome to La Plata, the charming city known for its beautiful parks, historic landmarks, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. Have a wonderful stay!"

restaurants.name: Charles Street Bakery
restaurants.description: Charles Street Bakery is a bakery located in La Plata.

restaurants.name: La Tolteca
restaurants.description: La Tolteca is a mexican restaurant located in La Plata.

restaurants.name: Marie's Diner
restaurants.description: Marie's Diner is a diner located in La Plata.

restaurants.name: Hunan Star
restaurants.description: Hunan Star is a chinese restaurant located in La Plata.

restaurants.name: Galazio Restaurant
restaurants.description: Galazio Restaurant is a greek restaurant located in La Plata.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves most domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: Terminal A at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves Delta and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B/C
terminals.description: Terminal B/C at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves American Airlines and its partner airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Terminal D at Ronald Reagan Washington National Airport serves United Airlines and its partner airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No login or password is required.
